Medium: 12 woodcuts (including ornaments and wrapper front), some with linoleum cut: 11 printed in color and 1 printed in black; and 1 woodcut ornament on ivory, smooth, laid Auvergne Richard de Bas paper; and supplementary suite on white, smooth, laid Japan paper (except wrapper)
Dimensions:
irreg. page  10 13/16 x 7 7/8" (27 x 20 cm)
Prints:  various dimensions.
Title: CONTES
